alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Jeff Davis; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 2:47PM EST until December 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 17 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 18 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and northern Florida and southeast Georgia. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 6 PM Saturday to 11 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
